definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Symplast The living system of interconnected protoplasts extending through a plant body.
sentences.chinese: 内部相连的原生质体生命系统在植物体中延伸形成。

sentences.english: It seems that sustain division is within the limits of the protoplasts of small size only.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有体积小的原生质体能保持持续分裂。

sentences.english: The plasmids enter the plant tissue and produce a swelling, or tumor.
sentences.chinese: 原生质进入植物组织后产生了浮肿，或者说是肿瘤。

sentences.english: Protoplasts can be used as another good experimental material to induce hairy roots of Scutellaria baicalensis Georgi.
sentences.chinese: 原生质体可以作为黄芩毛状根诱导的又一良好的材料。

sentences.english: He might as well have asked me my grandmother's opinion of protoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 他或许还问了我奶奶对原生质的看法。

sentences.english: Temperature remarkably affected the frequency and the speed of protoplast fusion.
sentences.chinese: 温度明显影响原生质体融合的频率和速度。

sentences.english: The protoplasts formed calli in K8P liquid medium.
sentences.chinese: K8P原生质体培养基悬滴培养。

sentences.english: Generation of fungal protoplast is an essential tool for genetic transformation system .
sentences.chinese: 原生质体是研究和建立真菌遗传转化系统的重要工具。

sentences.english: All regenerated plants are albinos, probably due to their long-term culture history (one and a half years).
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今第一个由籼稻原生质体再生植株的报道。

sentences.english: A multinucleate mass of cytoplasm surrounded by a cell membrane.
sentences.chinese: 被细胞膜包裹的多核原生质块。

sentences.english: It provides scientific basis for the breeding of protoplast fusion of killer yeast.
sentences.chinese: 为嗜杀酵母原生质体融合育种提供了依据。

sentences.english: In the 1970s, scientists isolated bacterial plasmids.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪70年代，科学家分离出了细菌的原生质。

sentences.english: This is the first report of plant regeneration from the protoplast culture of an indica rice.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今第一个由籼稻原生质体再生植株的报道。

sentences.english: Higher division and plating frequency was obtained when the survival protoplasts cultured after cryopreservation.
sentences.chinese: 保存后成活的原生质体分裂频率和植板率均有所提高。

sentences.english: Transformation of HGE protoplasts and screening of the mutants.
sentences.chinese: 禾长蠕孢菌原生质体转化及突变体筛选与验证。

sentences.english: An effective method of protoplast liberation and protoplast reversion of Auricularia auricula was put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了木耳原生质体释放和再生的有效方法。

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
